actions: Spreads and regulates Liver Qi and alleviates pain.

(Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, reduces swelling and generates flesh.)
(With Mo Yao, substitutes for She Xiang.)
(Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, alleviates pain, reduces swelling, generates flesh and promotes healing.)

syndromes: Sores and abscesses due to Toxic Heat with Blood stagnation

notes: Grind equal amounts of the first two ingredients into a fine powder. Decoct Pu Gong Ying in wine and remove the dregs. Mix the remaining alcohol with the powder and for into a flat cake. Apply warm over the affected area.
